name: Moiré Moment
description:
[27-04-18]
This experiment with the concept of Moiré pattern. 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moir%C3%A9_pattern

An attempt to use this phenomenon as an analogy to explain that during this period of the day, the patterns of creative energy encounters the patterns of administrative obligations. The overlay of both creating the emergence of an oscillation. This oscillation is precisely what diverts my attention from getting any creative work done during the period of the day associated with the area covered by the convergence. 

This is one of the rare animation that haven't been posted on giphy in the past. Simply because I must have forgotten. 

[23-08-21]
Minting this 1:1 | 1080x1080 | 279FRAMES | 30 FPS
